label: 御訪
説明文: While the wet nurses, servant women, samurai, retainers, and maids, received benefices ―― called otoburai or go'on―― in twice yearly payments, forerunners of the modern-day summer and winter bonuses.#[article]Sugawara Masako. The yamashina House Ledger of Rents and Other Income and Expenses," and the Economy of the "House.""
